author: slive
msg: Make it clear what is meant by per-directory rewrites
and specify the rewrites in <Location> is unsupported.
(The same is probably true for <Files>, but I'd have to
think about that a little more.)

author: mrglavas
msg: If grammar caching is enabled and a document has both an internal and
external DTD subset endDTD() was never being called. This was causing
the DOM builder to drop all of the text in the document. This should
now be fixed as well as another bug which could lead to an NPE if
the validation feature is enabled but the load external DTD feature

author: aco
msg: Remove third party MQ implementations pending further discussions.

author: fmeschbe
msg: Part 2: JAXP Transform instead of Xerces Serializer
